name: Snail Race (Narkhos, KHAYYAM)
description:
Snail Race

Snail Race is a snail racing game for up to 4 players made for the 1 button jam 2022.

Story

Welcome to the ultimate running competition! The snail is the fastest animal in the world and he's out to prove it! No cheating here: no legs, wings, fins or wheels. Just speed through muscle power. Will you take up the challenge?

Controls

There is only one action key. Hold it to stretch your snail, release it to move forward:

- Player 1 : 'a' (or 'q' on an azerty keyboard)

- Player 2: 'f'

- Player 3: 'n'

- Player 4: 'right arrow'

Credits

Programming and graphics : Narkhos

Music and sfx : Khayyam Mirza
